import vpython as vp
import time

ball = vp.sphere(pos=vp.vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=vp.color.blue)
arrow = vp.arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vp.vector(1,1,0), color=vp.color.red)

while True:
    arrow.axis = vp.vector(1,1,0)
    ball.pos += arrow.axis * 0.01
    time.sleep(0.01)
